attributes.action: The BBC Licence Fee should not be compulsory.
attributes.additional_details: This is because the BBC should have to compete fairly with other broadcasters and a compulsory fee is unfair on lower income groups.
attributes.background: To change the Law so subscription to the BBC is voluntary.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649092
